thread.title: Trump, Carson demand that next debate be limited to 2 hours
thread.title_full: Trump, Carson demand that next debate be limited to 2 hours

author: JILL COLVIN
title: Trump, Carson demand that next debate be limited to 2 hours
text:
Steve Helber Trump, Carson demand that next debate be limited to 2 hours 
Republican presidential hopeful Donald Trump gestures as he speaks during a rally in Richmond, Va., Wednesday, Oct. 14, 2015. (AP Photo/Steve Helber) Posted: Thursday, October 15, 2015 5:13 pm 
WASHINGTON (AP) â€” Republican presidential candidates Donald Trump and Ben Carson are threatening to boycott the next GOP debate over its proposed format. Login required
